strings.Value: "Finally good news, Your Grace! {d|Varn}Maegar Varn{/d}, the ruler of {g|Varnhold}Varnhold{/g}, has sent aid! Together with goods came a messenger with {g|VarnHelp}a letter for you{/g}. Here, please, take it!"

"Wagon trains from {g|Varnhold}Varnhold{/g} have arrived in the capital. {d|Varn}Maegar Varn{/d} sends you his regards and asks you to accept the humble aid that he hopes will last you through these tough times. I think there are more details in {g|VarnHelp}his letter{/g}."

"Hmm... looks like {d|Varn}Maegar Varn{/d} wants something from you, {mf|Baron|Baroness}. Otherwise, why would he send you several wagon trains laden with bundles and sheafs? Here's {g|VarnHelp}the letter{/g} â€” I think it'll tell you the reason for Varn's fit of generosity."
